meanings.definition: A type of jet engine in which a fan provides additional thrust.
meanings.sent1: The fanjet on the airplane helped it fly faster.
meanings.sent2: The mechanic inspected the fanjet to ensure it was functioning properly.
meanings.sent3: The fanjet decided to take a vacation and relax in the clouds.
meanings.sent4: Her determination was a fanjet propelling her towards her goals.
meanings.sent5: The roar of the fanjet filled the air as the plane took off.

meanings.definition: A person who is a fan of something, such as a sports team or celebrity.
meanings.sent1: As a fanjet of the band, she attended every concert.
meanings.sent2: The fanjet eagerly waited in line to meet the famous actor.
meanings.sent3: The fanjet proudly displayed their collection of memorabilia.
meanings.sent4: Her enthusiasm was like a fanjet, lifting the spirits of everyone around her.
meanings.sent5: The young fanjet's face lit up when they received an autograph from their favorite player.
